title: 16.6 Million People Work In Renewable Energy?
full_text: 16.6 Million People Work In Renewable Energy?. The International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA) has just published a report about renewable energy jobs: Renewable Energy and Jobs Annual Review 2025. What really jumps out is the fact that about 16.6 million people worked in renewable energy jobs last year…. Support CleanTechnica's work through a Substack subscription or on Stripe.
